title: CS 577 Grade Distribution
comments: There is a huge curve. Doing all the homework and participation, along with whatever percent you got on your quizzes, should get you a passing grade even if you get a 0% on the final
I got a 68% in the class last semester and that was a B. Obviously it will vary by semester but you'll be fine.
Out of curiosity has anyone ever heard of someone getting a 50 on the exam?
